parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: A vector of strings naming the variables of interest in data

parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: The grouping variable with two levels

parameters.name: xlevels
parameters.desc: The two levels of the grouping variable (Order matters)

parameters.name: hypothesis
parameters.desc: 'different', 'greaterthan' or 'lessthan', the alternative hypothesis; group 1 different to group 2, group 1 greater than group 2, and group 1 less than group 1 respectively

parameters.name: effectsize
parameters.desc: 1 or 0, provide Cohen's d effect sizes

parameters.name: ci
parameters.desc: 1 or 0, provide confidence intervals for the mean difference

parameters.name: meandiff
parameters.desc: 1 or 0, provide means and standard deviations

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty.
